post.body: Bored at work on the day after thanksgiving.
Too much goose island, cheese ball, turkey and chess. Belly ache and crippled pride.
Is anyone even reading these? I feel like i'm twittering myself which may make me go blind.
I wish every day was the day before thanksgiving. 45 Minute commute today. Normally 90 minutes.
Driving to Chicago Haiku: commuter brakelights, / automobiles crawl along, / and i am at peace.
Texting in traffic. stupid rain snow mix. Aargh!
Riding the exercise bike at 530 am while listening to adam carolla.
Going to get some coffee and breakfast. Num nums!
Woke up 50 minutes ago. Watching tv online while waiting for kids to tutor.
Drank some bad chocolate milk (metaphorically speaking) and my stomach (allegorically speaking) is painin.
My daughter is screaming at my face.
